Articles.Content: Is there a version of Mechjeb newer than 2.0.7? Mine, which was compatible with KSP versions up through 0.20, is now broken out of the box when placing it in 0.21. I unzipped the mod, put the part in the parts folder and the plugin in the plugins folder, but when I select the part in the VAB, I can't place it on my ship or pick up any other parts.
The latest version should be here : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47317-MechJeb-2-Patch-test-bed-release-%28September-9%29
